skills.name: STIFLE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage and 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• Removes Immunity Effects including Perfect Immunity.
• 50% Chance to inflict Perfect Corruption for 3 turns.

skills.name: NEW MILLENNIUM
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage and 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• Grants Regen HP for 1 turn to all allies.

skills.name: SPIRAL PATH
desc: • Grants Immunity to Sleep and Lower MAX HP effects to all allies.
• Heal all allies based on your MAX HP when you take damage..
